articles.title: High inflation and interest rates: Impact on investors, markets - The Indian Express
articles.description: The shape of the earnings growth trajectory this year is more critical than in an average year — the so-called Goldilocks scenario for India, the ideal state in which all factors in an economic system are just right, depends on it.
articles.content: The spike inretail inflation in July to 7.44% has created some uncertainty in the minds of investors and savers. Analysts do not expect a cut in interest rates in the current fiscal; there is in fact… [+5974 chars]
